title: Ty Cobb Green Portrait PSA 4 PRICE DROP AGAIN
author: Brass23

posts.post_title: Ty Cobb Green Portrait PSA 4 PRICE DROP AGAIN
posts.post_content:
Hello my name is Doug and I am looking to sell my PSA 4 Ty Cobb Green Portrait
[url]http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=4&u=17829358[/url]
[url]http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=3&u=17829358[/url]

I am asking $2450 as I see them on ebay for $3000. Thanks
Paypal gift or postal money order accepted (to avoid 3%)

Email [url]kilaartist@aol.com[/url]

Something smells fishy about the auction on ebay.   Mysteriously someone with 1 and 2 feedback who have 100% of their action with the seller bid the item from $1400 to the $2350 it's at now.  Anyone else agree?

[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/110970290242?ssPageName=STRK:MEWAX:IT&_trksid=p3984.m1438.l2649[/url]

[quote name="sycks22" post=1049439]Something smells fishy about the auction on ebay.   Mysteriously someone with 1 and 2 feedback who have 100% of their action with the seller bid the item from $1400 to the $2350 it's at now.  Anyone else agree?

[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/110970290242?ssPageName=STRK:MEWAX:IT&_trksid=p3984.m1438.l2649[/url][/QUOTE]

hmmmmm....it still hasnt reached its reserve as well....
The seller also has no eBay activity in over a year.

Why did this card get reposted in another thread?

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=158490[/url]

[quote name="Jlighter" post=1049452]The seller also has no eBay activity in over a year.[/QUOTE]

what are we saying here?
